name: General
info: This Chrome Extension main Purpose is to automatically update your MAL-List

name: Authorization
info: The Authorization works via the MAL-Api v2 and accesses your Account directly

name: Extension shows a 1 at the Icon
info: This means an Update is available

name: Generic - Active
info: Whether the Script runs on th einjected Pages or not

name: Generic - Show History
info: The History saves all watched Episodes with the Date

name: Generic - Show Timeline
info: The Timeline of currentently running Animes

name: Generic - Unauthorize
info: Removes the Access Token to your MAL-Account

name: Cache - Show Cache
info: Shows all cached Infos

name: Cache - Delete full Cache
info: Completly deletes the Cache

name: Cache - Delete Cache (This URL)
info: Tries to delete the Cache Entry for this URL

name: Cache - Export Cache
info: Exports the Cache in json Format

name: Cache - Import Cache
info: Imports the json File exported form Export Cache

name: Bookmark - Active
info: Whether the Extension should handle Bookmarks

name: Bookmark - Bookmarks Folder
info:
Enter the Name of the Folder in which the Extension should add/remove the Bookmarks.
 Will create a new Folder if non exits with the given Name

name: AutoBookmark - Auto Bookmarks Active
info: Whether the Extension should automatically create Bookmarks

name: AutoBookmark - Auto Bookmarks Smart Mode
info: Whether the Extension should calculate the Time until next Anime appears and checks more often after offically airing or just check every 10 minutes

name: AutoBookmark - Auto Bookmarks Notification
info: Whether the Extension should notifiy the User about the added Bookmarks

name: AutoBookmark - Auto Bookmarks Smart Offset
info: The Offset in hours between offical release time and release time on the sites (default is 1.5)

name: AutoBookmark - Preferred Bookmark Site
info: Change the Site which the Extension should choose when creating Bookmarks automatically

name: Discord - Active
info: Whether the Extension should show a DRP

name: Discord - Remove DRP
info:
Instantly removes your DRP
Should only be used if bugged
